snippet: Goaltender Cory Schneider, whose contract was easier to move than that of Vancouver’s longtime starter Roberto Luongo, came out on the short end of the Devils’ overtime loss to the Canucks.
abstract: New Jersey Devils goaltender Cory Schneider returns to Vancouver for first time in Devils uniform, in match billed as duel with rival Roberto Luongo and Vancouver Canucks, his former team.
lead_paragraph: Goaltender Cory Schneider, whose contract was easier to move than that of Vancouver’s longtime starter Roberto Luongo, came out on the short end of the Devils’ overtime loss to the Canucks.

headline.main: In Return to Vancouver, Schneider Duels Old Team
headline.print_headline: Moving On, but Still Splitting Duties
